com.milk.objed.gui
Class BaseFieldsEditorComponent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.objed.gui.BaseFieldsEditorComponent
public final class BaseFieldsEditorComponent
extends java.lang.Object

This is the component for interacting with BaseFieldsEditors, sort of. It just has the appropriate makeComponent method, which in fact returns a FieldsEditorComponent. This is done because the latter is only an interface and won't actually get found via a superclass search (which is what EditorControl does).

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
